headline: The Trucking Industry Gap Nobody's Filling
primaryText:
Did you know?

Federal law requires truck drivers to take 10-hour rest breaks. During these breaks, drivers are stuck at truck stops - they can't leave their truck.

3.5 million drivers. Limited food options. Overpriced truck stop meals. No delivery services reach them.

That's the gap.

TL Driver Connect is a franchise opportunity to own this market in your territory:

‚Ä¢ Food delivery to truck stops
‚Ä¢ Auto parts on-route
‚Ä¢ Mileage & expense tracking
‚Ä¢ Driver community features
‚Ä¢ Full business management suite

We provide the technology. You own the territory.

Explore the platform: tldriverconnect.com

primaryText:
